name: Hyper Spacetime
description:
Hyper Spacetime is a trippy platformer that will challenge both your reflexes and your sanity.

You have to jump between the light and dark world, flip gravity (like alot), pop in and out of fun wormholes, dodge strange little things that want to kill you or something and maybe save the universe (or not, it's hard to tell).

Also secrets, there are secrets... but I'm not telling where, because then they wouldn't be secrets.

Keyboard and Gamepad supported, system specs are fairly low (I mean, it's basically a bunch of pixels that do silly stuff right?) but you should be fine provided your running Windows Vista/7/8 or 10 and have atleast a couple of GB of ram. Currently no support for Linux or OSX, but perhaps in the future!

Hyper Spacetime was developed by Ben Leggett and funded by Northern Ireland Screen, The Arts council of Northern Ireland Lottery funding.
